title: An Interview With Nadine Chahine
content: [Watch this interesting interview in English with Lebanese Arabic font designer Nadine Chahine, who is based in Germany at Linotype](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004647/http:/www.dw.de/insight-germany-lebanese-typographer-nadine-chahine-2013-07-03/e-16881203-9798)
author: Vladimir Tamari
